page.title: 13SCHOOL
page.content: The old village school was founded 113 years ago, and closed 16 years ago (1969) when the present school was built. The 'new' school has at present (1985) 60 pupils in 3 classes. {Class 1.......5-7 yrs { Class 2.......7-9 yrs {Class 3.......9-11 yrs} The Headteacher is Mr.Barker and he teaches mainly class 3. We do mathematics, writing, language, reading, science, history, geography, art/craft, music, dance, sport, health education and lots of other things. We use a computer, keep pets and play games like table tennis, badminton, cricket and football at break times. School times are 09.00-15.30 except when there are clubs after school. Most pupils have their lunch at school and we have our own kitchens.
